00059 
00060 #ifndef _common_types_
00061 #define _common_types_
00062 
00063 
00064 /*
00065 ** Includes
00066 */
00067 
00068 /*
00069 ** Macro Definitions
00070 */
00071 
00072 
00073 #if defined(_ix86_)
00074 /* ----------------------- Intel x86 processor family -------------------------*/
00075 
00076   /* Little endian */
00077   #undef   _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00078   #define  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00079 
00080 #ifndef _USING_RTEMS_INCLUDES_
00081   typedef unsigned char         boolean;
00082 #endif
00083 
00084   typedef signed char           int8;
00085   typedef short int             int16;
00086   typedef long int              int32;
00087   typedef unsigned char         uint8;
00088   typedef unsigned short int    uint16;
00089   typedef unsigned long int     uint32;
00090 
00091 #elif defined(__PPC__)
00092    /* ----------------------- Motorola Power PC family ---------------------------*/
00093    /* The PPC can be programmed to be big or little endian, we assume native */
00094    /* Big endian */
00095    #define _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00096    #undef  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00097 
00098 #ifndef _USING_RTEMS_INCLUDES_
00099     typedef unsigned char         boolean;
00100 #endif
00101 
00102    typedef signed char           int8;
00103    typedef short int             int16;
00104    typedef long int              int32;
00105    typedef unsigned char         uint8;
00106    typedef unsigned short int    uint16;
00107    typedef unsigned long int     uint32;
00108 
00109 #elif defined(_m68k_)
00110    /* ----------------------- Motorola m68k/Coldfire family ---------------------------*/
00111    /* Big endian */
00112    #define _STRUCT_HIGH_BIT_FIRST_
00113    #undef  _STRUCT_LOW_BIT_FIRST_
00114 
00115 #ifndef _USING_RTEMS_INCLUDES_
00116    typedef unsigned char         boolean;
00117 #endif
00118 
00119    typedef signed char           int8;
00120    typedef short int             int16;
00121    typedef long int              int32;
00122    typedef unsigned char         uint8;
00123    typedef unsigned short int    uint16;
00124    typedef unsigned long int     uint32;
00125 
00126 #else  /* not any of the above */
00127    #error undefined processor
00128 #endif  /* processor types */
00129 
00130 
00131 #ifndef NULL              /* pointer to nothing */
00132    #define NULL ((void *) 0)
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 #ifndef TRUE              /* Boolean true */
00136    #define TRUE (1)
00137 #endif
00138 
00139 #ifndef FALSE              /* Boolean false */
00140    #define FALSE (0)
00141 #endif
00142 
00143 /******************************************************************************
00144 **  NOTE:  The RTEMS operating system defines a typedef named 'boolean' (which
00145 **  is an unsigned int).  When compiling a source file with RTEMS header files,
00146 **  one should insert:
00147 **    #define _USING_RTEMS_INCLUDES_
00148 **  before including this file so that the definition of 'boolean' in this file
00149 **  will be skipped.  Otherwise, one will get a compiler warning about multiple
00150 **  declarations.
00151 ******************************************************************************/
00152 #define OS_PACK  __attribute__ ((packed))
00153 
00154 #endif  /* _common_types_ */
